name: Cancer Care
description: Their dedicated team is led by an experienced oncologist and supported by skilled and compassionate nurses and nurse practitioners. The team works closely with registered dietitians, pathologists, pharmacists, palliative care specialists, professional counselors, social workers, and other specialists to create a comprehensive treatment plan for patients.

howToGetIt: Cancer Center 845 Jackson St, 1/F, San Francisco, CA 94133 Thursday 1-415-677-2826 (Mon – Fri: 9:00 a.m. – 5:30 p.m.)
